description:
Terminull Brigade is an action-roguelike co-op hero shooter set in futuristic digital worlds.

Dive Into The Nullverse, Master Your Rogueteers to make the last stand against unfolding shadow algorithms. Choose your Rogueteer, unite in the virtual realm, and participate in the rebellion to free enslaved digital worlds.

Your destinies are coded in ones and zeroes. Launch the Terminull and free the Nullverse.

DIVE INTO THE NULLVERSE
Dive into the ever-changing Nullverses, each featuring unique enemies and biomes. Experience randomized challenges and rewards with each exploration as you unravel the rich stories and mysteries of these captivating worlds.

JOIN THE TERMINULL BRIGADE
Choose your avatar from a variety of Rogueteers, each with unique roles and synergies. Dive solo or team up in online co-op - You are strong alone, but you will be stronger together. Confront challenging bosses at the end of each dive and master your Rogueteer to achieve victory.

MASTER YOUR ROGUETEERS
Master your chosen Rogueteer, each with a unique personality, playstyle, and signature moves. Unlock a rich talent tree and customizable mods to enhance your gameplay, while discovering their background story the more you play.

PURGE, CRASH, RERUN
Every run is unique, allowing for endless build possibilities. With each victory or defeat, you gain new insights and grow stronger. Finish each dive by collecting loot to craft powerful weapons and mods for your next challenge.
shortDescription: Terminull Brigade is a PvE looter shooter with roguelike elements set in a virtual multiverse.
